SELECT VH.VHC_ID , VH.VHC_NO , VH.CHAS_NO , CO.CORP_NM AS CORP_NM , VH.CORP_ID , VH.RELS_DATE , VH.MODEL_NM , DL0.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_KIND , DL1.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_TYPE , DL3.DL_CD_NM AS LF_YN , DL2.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_FUEL , DL4.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER , DL5.DL_CD_NM AS AREA , VH.REMARK , VH.USE_YN FROM BM_VHC_INFO VH LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL0 ON VH.VHC_KIND = DL0.DL_CD AND DL0.CO_CD = 'VHC_KIND' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL1 ON VH.VHC_TYPE = DL1.DL_CD AND DL1.CO_CD = 'VHC_TYPE' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL2 ON VH.VHC_FUEL = DL2.DL_CD AND DL2.CO_CD = 'VHC_FUEL' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL3 ON VH.LF_YN = DL3.DL_CD AND DL3.CO_CD = 'LF_YN' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL4 ON VH.MAKER = DL4.DL_CD AND DL4.CO_CD = 'VHC_MAKER' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL5 ON VH.AREA = DL5.DL_CD AND DL5.CO_CD = 'AREA' LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CORP_INFO CO ON VH.CORP_ID = CO.CORP_ID
VH.VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR VH.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
SELECT DVC_ID , MNG_ID FROM BM_DVC_INFO WHERE VHC_ID = #{vhcId} AND MNG_ID = #{mngId}
SELECT DVC_ID , MAKER , DVC_KIND , INST_LOC , MNG_ID , DVC_IP , VHC_ID , REMARK FROM BM_DVC_INFO WHERE DVC_ID = #{value}
SELECT DVC_ID , DL0.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND FROM BM_DVC_INFO DVC LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL0 ON DVC.DVC_KIND = DL0.DL_CD AND DL0.CO_CD = "DVC_KIND" ORDER BY DVC_ID DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT D.VHC_ID , D.USE_YN , D.DVC_ID , DL0.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER_CD , DL1.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND_CD , DL3.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC_CD , D.MAKER , D.DVC_KIND , D.INST_LOC , D.MNG_ID , D.DVC_IP , D.REMARK , V.VHC_ID FROM BM_DVC_INFO D LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VHC_INFO V ON D.VHC_ID = V.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL0 ON D.MAKER = DL0.DL_CD AND DL0.CO_CD = 'DVC_MAKER' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL1 ON D.DVC_KIND = DL1.DL_CD AND DL1.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL3 ON D.INST_LOC = DL3.DL_CD AND DL3.CO_CD = 'INST_LOC' WHERE V.VHC_ID = #{value}

SELECT HIST.DEV_SERIAL_NO , IFNULL(UPD.COMPLETE_YN , "Y") AS COMPLETE_YN FROM BM_DVC_HIST HIST LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO DVC ON HIST.DVC_ID = DVC.DVC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_UPD_LOG UPD ON DVC.MNG_ID = UPD.MNG_ID WHERE DVC.DVC_ID = #{value}
